title: A SHORT FILM ABOUT LOVING - PRESS GALLERY
captions: Post from Fulbright University Vietnam's Art Lab.
With Cuong Le and Thanh Nguyen, Director and D.O.P. of 'The Glorious Pain' (2020), and Thao Luu, Project Coordinator of OKIA Hanoi Film Production & Creative Hub.
Q&A with Nguyen Hoang Diep, Director of 'Dap Canh Giua Khong Trung' (2014) and Founder of OKIA Hanoi Film Production & Creative Hub.
